name: relawand-app
description: RelaWand IoT Web Application with React Next.js, Express.js, and MongoDB

scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/node_modules server/node_modules node_modules client/.next server/dist
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cp server/.env.example server/.env
scripts.setup:no-docker: npm run install:all && cp server/.env.example server/.env && echo 'Setup complete! Please install MongoDB locally or use MongoDB Atlas.'
